TopicTitle: looking for a mod to add or change colours of parts

Articles.Content:
im currently looking for mods that are 1.0.2 that would allow me to change the colours of parts im a little bored of my sleek rockets looking ugly because colours are not matched etc etc

is there such a mod

i know there was one for versions 0.24 but it doesnt seem to work with 1.0.2

I thought KerbPaint was being maintained?

There is an update from the 9th of May covering all the new wings as well on the last page from Eorin
